overview:
• Managing Director, Everyday Health India Private Limited, a subsidiary of NY based Waterfront Media www.watefrontmedia.com.
  • Founder at Netramind, a full service Search Marketing firm servicing clients in USA and Europe.
  • Over 20 years of experience in Domestic and International Management, Operations, Strategic Planning, Search Marketing, Online Media, Product Engineering and Development in the Information Technology industry.
  • Holds a proven track record of success as a change agent, successfully overseeing startups, turnarounds and consolidations of companies operating in the areas of Software Development, Project Management, General Management and setting up Infrastructure & Offshore Development Centers.
